entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
